title: fix the broken screen in pixel 2
content:
I dropped my phone and my screen stopped working.
Now I can feel that the phone can restart and the fingerprint sensors are working. But cannot see anything in the screen. I am located in Salem., Tamil Nadu, India right now. I want to know if there is a authorized service center in and around my location and want to get my screen fixed/replaced.
Also my phone mic is not working. So want to get it both fixed. Please guide me to the right contact.
